name: Xeno's SAS4 weapons pack
description: Adds all the weapons included inside the game SAS4 Zombie assault, only the base quality is present (aka, no red, no black), please do consider that these weapons are not a property of mine, and as that they belong to NInjaKiwi. all of these weapons are a work of finction, and are not in any way related to real guns, launchers or weapons.
